Additionally, seeking help from a teacher or tutor can be beneficial.""I agree with your suggestion about practicing more. Regular revision will reinforce what you have learned.",

"You also mentioned being overwhelmed by the amount of material covered in class. One way to combat this is to create a study schedule and break it up into manageable chunks. This will make it easier for you to focus on one topic at a time.",
",""To further develop your vocabulary skills, consider using flashcards or creating word associations. These techniques can help solidify new words in your mind and make learning more engaging.",

2.feedback:
Thank you for your honesty. Let's focus on the areas that need improvement. One strategy I recommend is practicing verb conjugation regularly to strengthen your grammar skills. Additionally, reading authentic texts can help improve comprehension and vocabulary acquisition. Keep in mind that learning a language requires consistent practice and patience. Don't be discouraged if it takes time to master certain concepts. We will work together to set goals and monitor your progress.
